    \index{GroundSegment \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests \textit{(module)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests.AlarmTestCase \textit{(class)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests.AlarmTestCase.setUpClass \textit{(class method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{setUpClass}(\textit{cls})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Crea los maestros de operacion para el resto de los test de esta unidad

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{GroundSegment:Verification:Alarms:tests:AlarmTestCase:testNewAlarm}
    \index{GroundSegment \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests \textit{(module)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests.AlarmTestCase \textit{(class)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests.AlarmTestCase.testNewAlarm \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{testNewAlarm}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    1.Testea la creacion de alarmas mediante el metodo de clase new, 
    seleccionando un tipo de alarma aleatorio

    2.Testea los cambios de estado del misma mediante el llamado a metodos

    3.Verifica que las acciones a realizar en los cambios de estados se 
    implementan correctamente

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{GroundSegment:Verification:Alarms:tests:AlarmTestCase:testDuplicateAlarmaType}
    \index{GroundSegment \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms \textit{(package)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests \textit{(module)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests.AlarmTestCase \textit{(class)}!GroundSegment.Verification.Alarms.tests.AlarmTestCase.testDuplicateAlarmaType \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{testDuplicateAlarmaType}(\textit{self})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    1.Testea que no se puedan crear dos alarmas del mismo tipo

    2.Genera una excepcion que hace fallar el test

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
